channel.title: OrientxScape Server needs development team
channel.description:
Whats OrientX?
We are creating a team who are going to be working on a 711 (maybe more) server and will be buying vps/webhosting/domain etc, there is going to be really cool features on the server were looking for dedicated staff who are willing to stick by us.
--I work, so i have some money--
We also need:
Admins: (0/3) Mods: (0/3)
People we need------
Coders--[0/3] <--- source sided Coders--[0/3] <--- Client sided Web Developers--[0/2] <--- must know html/css GFx--[0/3] Bug/Glitch testers-- [0/3]
How to apply -----------
How old are you--: Role your applying for--: Experience--: Maturity Level--: How long you can be on--: Will you be dedicated--: Skypename/msn if you have it--:
--This is a format that i copied from someone else, i found it very helpful.
to contact me please add me on skype: marco.oliva96
NOTE: When applying please show me some of your work, thanks.

Will you be dedicated–:yes ofcourse
Skypename/msn if you have it–:noelverleye

item.description:
@Belob0g wrote:

well dharma, it would be really nice if you could help me out, however if u need any type of help i can also be useful.

If you want to add me on skype my username is marco.oliva96

I suggest you to add me, so we can discuss about our servers development.

Experience–: 2 years of source and client coding
Maturity Level–: 100%
How long you can be on–: all day if possible
Will you be dedicated–: I am a dedicated source coder for 18 different servers
Skypename/msn if you have it- brandon.miller 593
